posts.title: Hexo 簡單紀錄
posts.text: 參考此篇文章，即可快速建立 Hexo 10分鐘內從安裝Hexo到佈署至GitHub Pages。 Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
